artifacts.summary: Restructured buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent with SeedWellFormed hypothesis; fixed atom/bot cases; added well-formedness infrastructure

partial_progress.details: Session 9: (1) Added SeedWellFormed hypothesis to buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent. (2) Proved initialSeedWellFormed for initial seed. (3) Added helper lemmas: find?_getElem_of_findIdx?, getFormulas_eq_findIdx?_entry, addFormula_nextFamilyIdx. (4) Fixed atom and bot cases using getFormulas_eq_of_wellformed_and_at_position. (5) Added 3 well-formedness lemma stubs: addFormula_preserves_wellFormed, createNewFamily_preserves_wellFormed, createNewTime_preserves_wellFormed (marked sorry for future session). RecursiveSeed.lean: 10 sorries (unchanged count, but 3 atom/bot fixed + 3 new well-formedness stubs).

next_steps: 1. Complete 3 well-formedness preservation lemmas (addFormula, createNewFamily, createNewTime). 2. Complete 7 operator sorries in buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent: Box/G/H (3), neg-Box/neg-G/neg-H (3), generic imp (1). Each requires showing seed transformations preserve consistency and well-formedness, and IH hypotheses are satisfied.
